mapper.select: SELECT PLAN_NO as no, PLAN_TITLE as title, USER_ID as userId, PLAN_START as startDate, PLAN_END as endDate, PLAN_MEMBER as member, PLAN_HASHTAG as hashTag, CNT as likeCnt FROM (SELECT row_number() over (order by L.CNT DESC ) as rn, P.PLAN_NO, P.PLAN_TITLE, P.USER_ID, P.PLAN_START, P.PLAN_END, P.PLAN_MEMBER, P.PLAN_HASHTAG, L.CNT FROM PLANNER P, (SELECT NO, COUNT(NO) AS CNT FROM LIKES WHERE LIKES_CATEGORY = 'PLANNER' GROUP BY NO) L WHERE P.PLAN_NO = L.NO(+) AND L.CNT IS NOT NULL AND P.PLAN_STATUS IN ('Y', 'N') AND P.PLAN_OPEN = 'Y') WHERE RN <= 4

select no, name, price, category, images, discountRate, sellingStart, sellingEnd, locationCity from(select no, name, price, category, images, discountRate, sellingStart, sellingEnd, locationCity,row_number() over(order by sum desc) as rn, sum from(select T.ticket_no no, T.ticket_name name, T.ticket_price price, T.ticket_category category, T.ticket_images images, T.discount_rate discountRate, T.selling_start sellingStart, T.selling_end sellingEnd, T.location_city locationCity,nvl(sum,0) sum from(select distinct T.ticket_no, T.ticket_name, T.ticket_price, T.ticket_category, T.ticket_images, T.discount_rate, T.selling_start, T.selling_end, T.location_city from ticket T, (select location_name, location_city from locations
where location_city in ('서울특별시','인천광역시','경기도_경기북부','경기도_경기남부')
where location_city in ('충청북도','충청남도','전라북도','전라남도','대전광역시')
where location_city in ('강원도')
where location_city in ('경상북도','경상남도','부산광역시','대구광역시')
where location_city in ('제주특별자치도') ) L where (L.location_name like '%'||T.location_city||'_%') or L.location_name = T.location_city or L.location_city like '%'||T.location_city||'%' and T.selling_end >= sysdate) T, (select ticket_no,sum(order_qty) sum from ticket_order group by ticket_no) O where T.ticket_no = O.ticket_no(+))) where rn <= 5

select user_id as userId , plan_title as title , to_char(plan_start, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as startDate , to_char(plan_end, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as endDate , plan_member as member , create_date as createDate , plan_status as status from planner where plan_no = #{value}
select U.user_id as id , U.user_status as status , U.user_profile as profile from planner P , planner_user U where P.user_id = U.user_id and P.plan_no = #{value}
select count(*) from Planner P , Likes L where P.plan_no = L.no and L.likes_category = 'PLANNER' and P.plan_no = #{value}
select count(*) from Planner P , Reply R where P.plan_no = R.no and R.rep_category = 'PLANNER' and P.plan_no = #{value}
mapper.update: update planner set plan_status = 'D' where plan_no = #{value}
mapper.select: select count(*) from likes where user_id = #{id} and no = #{pno}
mapper.insert: insert into likes (no, user_id, likes_category) values (#{pno}, #{id}, 'PLANNER')
